评论详情: These sun glasses are exactly as pictured. They are made of good quality and are sturdy. They were a good value for the money and are comfortable. They came with a glass case and a cleaning cloth. The lenses are dark.

The packaging alone should tell you how great the quality of the glasses are. I was very shocked when they came wrapped nicely and with a sleeve/case with a cleaning cloth. While they are not as heavy as designer glasses they still have some weight to them and look so stunning on the face.

These are definitely sturdy and the lenses are great, but I cannot wear them for long because they squeeze my head just enough to be uncomfortable long term. Maybe I have a big head (we'll pretend it's because I'm smart), but it does make it so I can't wear them to drive or anything, only briefly to be cute. But they ARE cute!

I normally buy designer sunglasses, but after reading an online review recommending these, I decided to try them. I have a small face, so I was skeptical that these would work for me, but they fit beautifully.  I originally bought them in black. and I liked them so well in black that I ended up buying a second pair in black, and I also bought them in tan and in white. They're GREAT sunglasses and I receive compliments on them every time I wear them. The black framed glasses have super dark lenses, which are great in bright sunlight; the tan and white framed glasses have more lightly tinted lenses. These look like designer sunglasses. I love them and highly recommend them.
They don't feel cheap. They're cute and fit comfortably.

评论概述: Safe delivery box, nice case, super fit glasses
评论详情: Good good good! Thank you so much, I’m so excited!

评论概述: Four stars for the uneven coloring but glasses are VERY GOOD overall.
评论详情: I would say that the problem I faced does not apply to white or black probably because it seems specific to my pair of tortoise shell one.  What happens is that the left side of the glasses look much lighter then the right side as you look at the person wearing them.  I do't know what causes it but clearly they look like made of two different tones of the plastic.  I will order another pair to see if I get more luck to get evenly shaded glasses.  Overall they are amazing because they are very thick not thin cheap plastic. they feel like very expenisve glasess.  The fit just right on average head but my friend with slightly wider face said they are kind of tight. So this may be something to consider for person with wider face as I personally do not like tight sunglasses so if t hat was the case I could not wear them.  Returning to try better pair now. Overall I highly recommend them, they truly look classy and expensive.

These are pretty good quality, sturdy sunglasses. I would say it's definitely fit for a smaller face, so if you have a more delicate bone structure, this is for you. I like that it also comes with a lens wipe and glasses case.

So I've been getting few pairs of sunglasses as of late so I gave these a try.  Qualitywise, these are great for a great price- solid construction, nice fit, not flimsy or crooked at all.  It comes with a bright carry case even and a cleaning cloth.  This is a NICE pair of fun "cheap" sunglasses.  That said, this pair felt like a slightly NICER pair of glasses than I would've picked up in 1995 at a Maurices or from a Delias catalogue.  I don't think I've ever owned a pair of cheap "clout goggles" that wasn't slightly crooked in any way haha.  So if you want a little retro fun to spice up the wardrobe, I HIGHLY recommend these.Fitwise, I have a longer narrow face and I probably would've passed on these if I tried them on in the store but only because they felt a little wide for my long narrow face.  I am middle aged, and while they capture the vibe of 1995, I won't lie and say I did get a bit of the "wonkavision" look when i checked myself out in them.  I let my daughter try them.  She has a more round face, and she felt that the size of them covered her eyebrows too much and she felt like an egg in them.  I thought she looked cute as a button, but she had issues with them covering her brows up.  Of course the look of these on your face is subjective, but these are a nice pair of fun glasses!
Can't wait to wear them. I love everything about these pair of shades, value, style, fit,and the frames are perfect.
Glasses are very trendy and look s pictured. Plastic is thick and feels high quality. These also came with cute case and sunglasses wipe!

Pretty solid seeming pair of sunglasses, especially when considering the price. They look great as well--they really have a 60s mod look about them. They come with a soft slip case and microfiber cleaning cloth as well.
Great material just felt a little small but I have kind of a wide head

This is a pair of black, oval frame sunglasses with dark black lenses.  The frames are sturdy and thick and should hold up well over time.  The oval lenses give them a retro-vibe look. The sunglasses also come with a cleaning cloth and a bright yellow carrying case.  The carrying case is a little cheap looking in my opinion but will still do the job of protecting your sunglasses.  All in all, for the price, I think they are a well-made and fun pair of sunglasses to sport during the summer.HAPPY SHOPPING!
I have a smaller head and these for great. I love the shape and the thicker arms. Good price for sunglasses that look designer-ish.
Trendy case, cleaning cloth and sunglasses at this price are a great buy.  Plastic is thick and durable and the lenses provide decent light blocking

My girlfriend had this to say: These are super cute shades. I love the pale mocha color of the plastic. The color is an unusual shade that I haven't seen too much of elsewhere. It is a very basic neutral that can harmonize with a broad spectrum of colors (especially blacks, whites and earth tones). It will go with and help accessorize and style both casual and more elegant looks - and it will work great with a wide range of skin tones. The only issue for me is that the frame is just a bit outsized for my face - an issue that can sometimes arise when purchasing glasses online in general. That said - I think this is a really great pair of sunglasses that will look great on a lot of people.

评论概述: tight fit, hopefully will loosen up over time
评论详情: These sunglasses shipped in a small box that thankfully protected them in a much larger box with about 10 other items that definitely shifted all over en route. The fit is a bit tight and they do not have a hinge arm, so they are not flexible. Hoping they will loosen up over time because i really like how they look and the lenses are fairly dark. I may take them to the optical at WallyWorld and see if they will loosen them up a bit for me.

For a subtle retro vibe, these sunglasses are great.  Great classic color selection and thick, sturdy construction.  I will say, however, that this style looks better on smaller faces than bigger ones.  They are classic enough that you could jazz up your travel or Insta photos with these without seeming too costume-y.  No annoying logos on the arms.  Overall good pick.
